title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Million metric tons, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Million metric tons has increased over the Year
Million metric tons is rapidly constant from 2000 to 2017.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2000 and 2001.
Max Million metric tons about 13.05 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Million metric tons about 7.25 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Million metric tons, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2005 to 2015.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2000 to 2003.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2003 to 2005.
